Undoubtedly the best asymmetrical multiplayer (4vs1) horror game out there. Suitable for both casual and hardcore players. Playing survivor with friends is fun AF. Killing and sacrificing 3-4 survivors in a high rank game is satisfying AF. 10/10 would recommend :)

This game is pay to win. Half of the characters are simply not accessible except for real money and the perks that help you in the game are not available from these characters unless you are lucky in the weekly shop for iridescent shards. In any case, because of this money-hungry system, you can't even play some killer and it's cheeky that the new killer pinhead also costs real money! The game is also really toxic if you play Killer! after 2 matches you're already nervous at the end!

Just gonna start out saying this game is an absolute blast to play.  Finally hit my 1,000 hours of playing time and feel like i can give a proper review.

Pros: 
Killer selection is 9/10 (Trickster doesn't cause a 10/10)
Licensed killers are amazing
Unique add-ons make killers creppy and hard to go against
Plenty of perks to make our own unique and fun build
Do you wanna be Michael Myers and jump scare people? you can and its terrifying being on the opposite end as the survivor having him pop out of nowhere.
This game is probably at the top of survival horror genre.  This game takes skill to play effectively with learning how to loop as survivor, know when to save and not to save, knowing what perks synergise well with others, learning tiles, learning how to counter killer powers, the list goes on and one.  This is a TEAM GAME

Cons:
The typical bugs that come with every patch
Lobbies of solo players that don't know what a team game is
There are hackers, albeit slim but there are some. I have seen a few
Games can get very boring when people try to farm bc that's not the point of the game
Sweaty killers who camp survivors on hook

There are no rule books on how you should play but there are some very annoying things that happen but it is what it is.  Overall I would highly recommend this game if you haven't played it yet
great game with and without friends
